{ createThemeSessionResolver } from "remix-themes"\r
\r
// You can default to 'development' if process.env.NODE_ENV is not set\r
const isProduction = process.env.NODE_ENV === "production"\r
\r
const sessionStorage = createCookieSessionStorage({\r
  cookie: {\r
    name: "theme",\r
    path: "/",\r
    httpOnly: true,\r
    sameSite: "lax",\r
    secrets: ["s3cr3t"],\r
    // Set domain and secure only if in production\r
    ...(isProduction\r
      ? { domain: "your-production-domain.com", secure: true }\r
      : {}),\r
  },\r
})\r
\r
export const themeSessionResolver = createThemeSessionResolver(sessionStorage)

clsx from "clsx"\r
import { PreventFlashOnWrongTheme, ThemeProvider, useTheme } from "remix-themes"\r
\r
import { themeSessionResolver } from "./sessions.server"\r
\r
// Return the theme from the session storage using the loader\r
export async function loader({ request }: LoaderFunctionArgs) {\r
  const { getTheme } = await themeSessionResolver(request)\r
  return {\r
    theme: getTheme(),\r
  }\r
}\r
// Wrap your app with ThemeProvider.\r
// \`specifiedTheme\` is the stored theme in the session storage.\r
// \`themeAction\` is the action name that's used to change the theme in the session storage.\r
export default function AppWithProviders() {\r
  const data = useLoaderData<typeof loader>()\r
  return (\r
    <ThemeProvider specifiedTheme={data.theme} themeAction="/action/set-theme">\r
      <App />\r
    </ThemeProvider>\r
  )\r
}\r
\r
export function App() {\r
  const data = useLoaderData<typeof loader>()\r
  const [theme] = useTheme()\r
  return (\r
    <html lang="en" className={clsx(theme)}>\r
      <head>\r
        <meta charSet="utf-8" />\r
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />\r
        <Meta />\r
        <PreventFlashOnWrongTheme ssrTheme={Boolean(data.theme)} />\r
        <Links />\r
      </head>\r
      <body>\r
        <Outlet />\r
        <ScrollRestoration />\r
        <Scripts />\r
        <LiveReload />\r
      </body>\r
    </html>\r
  )\r
}

{ Moon, Sun } from "lucide-react"\r
import { Theme, useTheme } from "remix-themes"\r
\r
import { Button } from "./ui/button"\r
import {\r
  DropdownMenu,\r
  DropdownMenuContent,\r
  DropdownMenuItem,\r
  DropdownMenuTrigger,\r
} from "./ui/dropdown-menu"\r
\r
export function ModeToggle() {\r
  const [, setTheme] = useTheme()\r
\r
  return (\r
    <DropdownMenu>\r
      <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>\r
        <Button variant="ghost" size="icon">\r
          <Sun className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem] rotate-0 scale-100 transition-all dark:-rotate-90 dark:scale-0" />\r
          <Moon className="absolute h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem] rotate-90 scale-0 transition-all dark:rotate-0 dark:scale-100" />\r
          <span className="sr-only">Toggle theme</span>\r
        </Button>\r
      </DropdownMenuTrigger>\r
      <DropdownMenuContent align="end">\r
        <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme(Theme.LIGHT)}>\r
          Light\r
        </DropdownMenuItem>\r
        <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme(Theme.DARK)}>\r
          Dark\r
        </DropdownMenuItem>\r
      </DropdownMenuContent>\r
    </DropdownMenu>\r
  )\r
}
